material: steel with black matte powder coat, rubber/plastic grips
usage: Pull down, press down, row, triceps, biceps & lats exercises on cable machines
key_features: Build stronger biceps, triceps, grip, lats, shoulders, and core
Superior construction with steel and black matte finish
ai_description: A sleek black matte cable attachment handle with two ergonomic, W-shaped molded grips designed for comfortable use. The handle features a prominent silver metal eyelet and bolt assembly at the top center for secure connection to cable machines. The black grips contrast with the silver hardware, creating a modern fitness accessory. Product imagery shows the handle against plain white backgrounds from multiple angles, highlighting its robust construction. Accompanying graphics emphasize features like non-toxic materials, smell-proof quality, and easy washability.
target_audience: Home gym users and fitness enthusiasts
product_name: KAKSS Cable Machine Attachments Narrow Outside Handle
